v0.1: 
MTK Wenming 2012-6-29:Bring up OK version(for MT5398/96/89, DTV/ATV ok)

v0.2:
AEC 2012-07-04.
According to MTK Wenming-san suggestion:
"CXD2837 Driver£¬should to complete the APIs which absent compare with CXD2834,
in functions DVBT2_TunerDVBT2Command()and DVBT2_TunerGetAttribute2()."

AEC work:

    In function DVBT2_TunerGetAttribute2,
    added item: TUNER_GET_TYPE_AGC item
                            TUNER_GET_TYPE_DBM_SNR
                            TUNER_GET_TYPE_DVBT2_PLP
    In function DVBT2_TunerDVBT2Command,
    for CLI item "s"
                            changed OFDMinfo.mode display
                            changed PLPInfo.constell display
                            added FEC header display
                            added L1Pre display
                            added L1Post display

SONY 2012-07-04
  Tuner register settings are updated.
    (sonyrf_ascot2e.c/h, sonyrf_ascot2e_re227.c/h)
  RE227_TunerOP(itGetSSIIndex) should be added.
    (pi_tuner_re227.c)

  RB221 driver for CXD2837 is added.
  The code is based on RE227 code.
  The difference between RB221 and RE227 module is that RB221 has AntSW.
  So, RB221_TunerOP(itSetInCableMode) is added to switch AntSW for analog.
  (It's same as RB221 driver for ISDB-T.)


v0.3
SONY 2012-07-11
T2 bug fix.
This bug has effect when the system go out from DVB-T2.

  Modified file: sony_demod_dvbt2.c
                 AT2toSLT function.

v0.4:
MTK wenming 2012-07
Add flag to decide reset demod or not.
Modified file: pd_glue_dvbt2.c


v0.5
SONY 2012-07-17
Add small modification for glue file.
 - Clearing break function pointer at the exit of the TunerAcq.
   (This is same modification for CXD2839 code. It's not affect to behavior but fixed for safe.)
 - RF level monitor OFF. (Not necessary for Sony silicon tuner.)
 - Small modification for Sony side debug.

   Modified file: pd_glue_dvbt2.c

Tuner code are updated for ES2 silicon tuner.

   Modified file: sonyre227/pi_tuner_re227.c
                  sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e.c/h
                  sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e_re227.c
                  sonyrb221/pi_tuner_rb221.c
                  sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e.c/h
                  sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e_rb221.c


v0.6
SONY 2012-07-25
Adding DVB-C SQI and SSI function to glue file.
NOTE: The formula using these functions is not formal. Defined by Sony.

   Modified file: pd_glue_dvbt2.c


v0.7
SONY 2012-07-26
Adding DVB-C scan mode setting in TunerAcq function.

   Modified file: pd_glue_dvbt2.c


v0.8
SONY 2012-07-27
Optimizing tuner control code.
(RSSI calculation especially.)

   Modified file: sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e.c/h
                  sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e_re227.c
                  sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e.c/h
                  sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e_rb221.c


v0.9
SONY 2012-08-03
CXD2840 code was merged in one release package.
Add DTMB support to RE227 driver.

   Modified file: sonyre227/pd_tuner_re227.c
                  sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e_re227.c

   NOTE: Demod code was not changed.


v0.10
SONY 2012-08-16
Optimizing tuner control code.

   Modified file: sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e_re227.c
                  sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e_rb221.c


v0.11
SONY 2012-08-23
Dynamic trap thresold modification for tuner driver.
Modify CLI to add command for changing trap threshold.
Modify CLI read/write command to specify bank.

   Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c
                  sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e_re227.c/h
                  sonyre227/pi_tuner_re227.c
                  sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e_rb221.c/h
                  sonyrb221/pi_tuner_rb221.c

   NOTE: Tuner_OP ID "itSetTrapThresold" is added for changing trap threshold.


v0.12
MTK 2012-08-30
Driver refine: Refine pd_glue_dvbt2.c to fix some coding defects
Line 645: noiseFigureDB1000 type defined to int32_t instead of uint32_t for warning of type convert in line 701 calculation.
Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c
Add MTK platform related settings.Add itGetRSSI OP to get RSSI.Modify itGetSSIIndex OP to get SSIIndex.
Modified file: sonyre227/pi_tuner_re227.c
           sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e_rb221.c
Add MTK platform RSSI offset.
Modified file: sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e_re227.c
           sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e_rb221.c
Fix building warning.
Modified file: sonyre227/sonyrf_i2c_MTK.c
           CXD2837/sony_integ_dvbc.c


v0.13
MTK 2012-09-13
Modify frequency boundary for MTK scan.
Modified file:CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c
              sonyre227/pi_tuner_re227.c
              sonyrb221/pi_tuner_rb221.c
Take off the additional tuning delay timing.
Modified file: sonyre227/pi_tuner_re227.c
               sonyrb221/pi_tuner_rb221.c


v0.14
SONY 2012-09-24
*NOTE* This update includes previous Sony update on 8/28
because this update was not merged to MTK source.

Update for adding CXD2842 (DVB-T/T2/C/S/S2) support.
SNR function optimization.
RF level monitor function optimization for low level cases.
DVB-T2 SQI/SSI monitor function modification for bad condition cases.
Shared If SetConfig ID was removed because this setting is always enabled.
Demod driver parameter optimization and code/comment beautifying.
Tuner driver update (debug log was incorrect so fixed.)

   Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c
                  CXD2837/sony_demod.c/h
                  CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbt.c/h
                  CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbt_monitor.c/h
                  CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbt2.c/h
                  CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbt2_monitor.c/h
                  CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbc.c/h
                  CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbc_monitor.c/h
                  CXD2837/sony_integ.c/h
                  CXD2837/sony_integ_dvbt_t2.c/h
                  CXD2837/sony_integ_dvbc.c
                  CXD2837/sony_tuner_terr_cable.h
                  sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e_re227.c
                  sonyre227/pi_tuner_re227.c
                  sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e_rb221.c
                  sonyrb221/pi_tuner_rb221.c

   NOTE: "CC_SONYDEMOD_CXD2842" macro should be defined if this driver is used for CXD2842.
         Please ensure that MTK upper layer NEVER activate (connect) both terrestrial and satellite
         SW module at same time.
         RE227 driver can be used for PE221/PE227 module (terrestrial part).


v0.15
SONY 2012-10-19

Demod parameter optimization for T2 FEF signal.
DVB-T SQI monitor optimization.
Demod driver code/comment beautifying.
Avoid RFAGC value read in ASCOT2E RSSI read if DVB-C.

   Modified file: CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbt2.c
                  CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbt_monitor.c
                  CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c
                  CXD2837/sony_demod.c
                  CXD2837/sony_integ_dvbt_t2.c
                  CXD2837/sony_integ_dvbc.c
                  sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e_re227.c
                  sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e_rb221.c

v0.16
MTK 2012-11-01
Add Function to Get Modulator Information
   Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c


v0.17
SONY 2012-11-01

Demod parameter setting was changed to optimize DVB-T BER period
for stabilizing SQI value.
Avoid RFAGC value read in ASCOT2E RSSI read for all broadcasting systems.

   Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c
                  sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e_re227.c
                  sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e_rb221.c


v0.18
SONY 2012-11-13

Demod parameter for DVB-C TS related setting was corrected.

   Modified file: CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbc.c

v0.19
MTK 2012-11-13

When TUNER_DVB_AUTO_T_T2 mode, HP Profile get from Middleware.

   Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c
                  CXD2837/sony_integ_dvbt_t2.c

v0.20
SONY 2012-12-06

DVB-T FEC auto recovery optimization was added.
DVB-C 64QAM optimization was added.
Terrestrial <-> Satellite switching code was modified for CXD2842.
  Checks demod register and confirm that re-initialization is necessary or not.
  (It comes from Satellite side discussion with Haibo-san.)

   Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c
                  CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbt.c
                  CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbc.c


v0.21
SONY 2012-12-17

Tuner I2C communication was changed from I2C gateway to I2C repeater.
NOTE: RE227(PE227)/RB221 driver uses CC_SONYDEMOD_CXD2837/CC_SONYDEMOD_CXD2842
      macros to change I2C communication method depend on chip type.
      Please do not forget to define them!

   Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c
                  CXD2837/sony_demod.c
                  sonyre227/pi_tuner_re227.c
                  sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e_re227.c
                  sonyrb221/pi_tuner_rb221.c
                  sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e_rb221.c


v0.22
SONY 2013-01-17

DVB-T2 1.7MHz BW support was added.
NOTE: "BW_1_7_MHz" and "SAW_BW_1_7M" should be defined in MTK source.

   Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c
                  sonyre227/pi_tuner_re227.c
                  sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e_re227.c
                  sonyre227/sonyrf_ascot2e.c/h
                  sonyrb221/pi_tuner_re227.c
                  sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e_re227.c
                  sonyrb221/sonyrf_ascot2e.c/h


v0.23
SONY 2013-04-11

DVB-C2 support was added.
  If CXD2841 (DVB-T/T2/C/C2/S/S2) is used, please define
  CC_SONYDEMOD_CXD2841 macro to enable satellite switching.
DVB-T2 1.7MHz BW carrier offset monitor was fixed to calculate accurate value.

   Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c
                  CXD2837/sony_demod.c
                  CXD2837/sony_demod.h
                  CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbt2_monitor.c
                  CXD2837/sony_dvbc2.h (New)
                  CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbc2.c/h (New)
                  CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbc2_monitor.c/h (New)
                  CXD2837/sony_integ_dvbc2.c/h (New)
                  CXD2837/Makefile
                  sonyre227/pi_tuner_re227.c
                  sonyrb221/pi_tuner_re227.c


v0.24
SONY 2013-04-15

DVBT2_TunerGetSignal DS ID and PLP ID support for DVB-C2.

  Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c

v0.25
MTK 2013-04-16

Sync struct TUNER_DVBC2_DS_PLP_LIST name with MTK MW.

  Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c

v0.26
SONY 2013-07-24

Change DVB-T BER period. (14 -> 16)

  Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c

v0.27
SONY 2013-10-24

DVB-T Echo optimization for new Teracom spec.
DVB-T2 related register optimization.(affect to DVB-C2 code too but no C2 behavior change.)
Small fixes of several monitor functions.

  Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c (version number only)
                 CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbt.c/h
                 CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbt2.c
                 CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbc2.c
                 CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbt_monitor.c
                 CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbc_monitor.c
                 CXD2837/sony_demod_dvbt2_monitor.c

v0.28
SONY 2013-11-01

DVB-T BER period switching depend on normal tuning or scanning.
 - Normal Tune: BER period is set to 16 for SQI stabilization.
 - Scan       : BER period is set to 14 for getting SQI quickly.

  Modified file: CXD2837/pd_glue_dvbt2.c
